field.label: Extra Allowed Filetypes in the WYSIWYG-editor
field.comment: By default the following filetypes are available after installing this module 'jpg', 'jpeg', 'png', 'gif', 'webp', 'svg', 'pdf', 'doc', 'docx', 'docm', 'odt', 'csv', 'txt', 'xml', 'xls', 'xlsx', 'ods', 'zip', 'tar', 'mp3', 'mp4', 'ogg', 'webm', 'bmp'
